entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 late in the afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the evening and after midnight. A few flurries beginning overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:56 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
